# Example on real dataset

```{r load-data, cache = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(DT)
library(dplyr)
library(monocle)
library(HSMMSingleCell)
data(HSMM)
devtools::load_all("~/oxford/switch/switchde/") ## REMOVE WHEN COMPLETED
```

Subset genes:

```{r subset-genes}
HSMM <- HSMM[rowSums(exprs(HSMM)) > 0, ]
HSMM <- HSMM[sample(seq_len(nrow(HSMM)), 5000), ]

x <- log2(exprs(HSMM) + 1)
pst <- HSMM$Pseudotime
```

```{r test-de}
sde <- switchde(x, pst)
```

We can then view the results, ordered by p-value:

```{r view-results}
datatable(arrange(sde, qval))
```
